title: Spicy Chicken Tacos
description: Delicious spicy chicken tacos with fresh salsa, guacamole, and cilantro.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Decadent chocolate lava cake served warm with a molten center.

title: Grilled Salmon Salad
description: Healthy grilled salmon served over mixed greens with lemon vinaigrette.

title: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef burger with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a sesame seed bun.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh Caprese salad with sliced tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and balsamic glaze.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy chicken Alfredo pasta with garlic, Parmesan cheese, and broccoli.

title: Vegetarian Sushi Rolls
description: Assorted vegetarian sushi rolls with avocado, cucumber, and carrots.

title: Steak Frites
description: Savory steak served with crispy French fries and a side of peppercorn sauce.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Garlic-infused shrimp scampi served over linguine pasta with a hint of lemon.

title: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian tiramisu dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

title: Pad Thai Noodles
description: Authentic Pad Thai noodles stir-fried with tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
